CustomField.description: If the complaint is not related CRM order then this field will be used to enter the ERP Order / Delivery Note Number// Use this field for non-S4 orders only. For S4 orders, use the "S4 Order" field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use this field for non-S4 orders only. For S4 orders, use the "S4 Order" field.
CustomField.label: Order Number
